(2009) | Next album = }} '''''ÎÎµ ÏÎ·Î½ Î±Î³Î¬ÏÎ· (With Love)''''' is the debut EP by [[Craig Owens (vocalist)|Craig Owens]], ex-vocalist for [[Chiodos]] and [[Cinematic Sunrise]]. It was released September 15, 2009, via [[Equal Vision Records]]. In December 2008, Craig Owens posted a cover of the [[Counting Crows]] song "Anna Begins" for download on his website iamcraigowens.com, as well as a demo of [[Edgar Allan Poe]]'s 'El Dorado'. Owens announced the name of his new solo EP via [[Twitter]], "ÎÎµ ÏÎ·Î½ Î±Î³Î¬ÏÎ·" which is, loosely translated, [[Greek language|Greek]] for "with love" and is pronounced "me tin agapi" in English. On July 21, 2009, Craig Owens announced on Twitter that he will be releasing the EP on September 15, 2009. ==Track listing== {{Tracklist | title1 = Cardigans and Swing Sets | length1 = 2:17 | title2 = Products of Poverty | note2 = featuring [[Stephen Christian]] from [[Anberlin]] | length2 = 3:42 | title3 = My Love | length3 = 3:56 | title4 = A Poem By Adam Wolfson | length4 = 0:51 | title5 = Big Apple Big Heart | length5 = 3:53 | title6 = All Based on a Storyline | length6 = 3:25 | title7 = First One, I Love You So Much More | note7 = Taken from the AP Acoustic Sessions | length7 = 3:31 | total_length = 21:35 }} ==Personnel== *[[Craig Owens (vocalist)|Craig Owens]] - lead vocals, piano *[[Brian Southall]] - guitar, bass, drums, percussion, programming [[Category:2009 albums]]
